Class FrameJsonFactory

public class FrameJsonFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A class that parses Frame objects from JSON.

Method Detail

getVehicleFrames

public static java.util.List<VehicleFrame> getVehicleFrames(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
Gets a list of VehicleFrames from the input JsonArray. Improperly formatted items in the array are ignored.

Parameters:
jsonArray - An array of frames defined in JSON.
Returns:
A list of all VehicleFrame objects that could be parsed from the array.

getVehicleFramesMappedByName

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,VehicleFrame> getVehicleFramesMappedByName(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
Parses the JsonArray to get a name-keyed map useful for display purposes.

Parameters:
jsonArray - The jsonArray to parse.
Returns:
A group of VehicleFrames created from the data and stored according to name.

getSingleVehicleFrame

public static VehicleFrame getSingleVehicleFrame(com.google.gson.JsonElement element)
Validates and gets a single VehicleFrame object from the input JsonElement.

Parameters:
element - The input element.
Returns:
A VehicleFrame based on the element's data if it has the required parts, or null if it doesn't.
